name: USMDS - U.S. Web Design System for React Native

items.name: alert
items.title: Alert
items.description: Displays a callout for user attention.
items.author: @blencorp

items.name: avatar
items.title: Avatar
items.description: An image element with a fallback for representing the user.
items.author: @blencorp

items.name: badge
items.title: Badge
items.description: Displays a badge or a component that looks like a badge.
items.author: @blencorp

items.name: banner
items.title: Banner
items.description: USWDS Banner component for official government websites.
items.author: @blencorp

items.name: biometricsignin
items.title: Biometric Sign In
items.description: Biometric authentication component with Face ID and Touch ID support.
items.author: @blencorp

items.name: button
items.title: Button
items.description: Displays a button or a component that looks like a button.
items.author: @blencorp

items.name: buttongroup
items.title: Button Group
items.description: A group of related buttons displayed together.
items.author: @blencorp

items.name: card
items.title: Card
items.description: Displays a card with header, content, and footer.
items.author: @blencorp

items.name: checkbox
items.title: Checkbox
items.description: A control that allows the user to toggle between checked and not checked.
items.author: @blencorp

items.name: checkboxtile
items.title: Checkbox Tile
items.description: A tile-style checkbox component.
items.author: @blencorp

items.name: collapsible
items.title: Collapsible
items.description: An interactive component which expands/collapses a panel.
items.author: @blencorp

items.name: dialog
items.title: Dialog
items.description: A window overlaid on either the primary window or another dialog window.
items.author: @blencorp

items.name: icon
items.title: Icon
items.description: Icon component wrapper for lucide-react-native.
items.author: @blencorp

items.name: link
items.title: Link
items.description: A navigational link component.
items.author: @blencorp

items.name: pagination
items.title: Pagination
items.description: Pagination component for navigating through pages.
items.author: @blencorp

items.name: progress
items.title: Progress
items.description: Displays an indicator showing the completion progress of a task.
items.author: @blencorp

items.name: radiobutton
items.title: Radio Button
items.description: A set of checkable buttons where no more than one can be checked at a time.
items.author: @blencorp

items.name: radiotile
items.title: Radio Tile
items.description: A tile-style radio button component.
items.author: @blencorp

items.name: snackbar
items.title: Snackbar
items.description: A brief message displayed at the bottom of the screen.
items.author: @blencorp

items.name: stepindicator
items.title: Step Indicator
items.description: Shows progress through a multi-step process.
items.author: @blencorp

items.name: tag
items.title: Tag
items.description: A tag or label component.
items.author: @blencorp

items.name: text
items.title: Text
items.description: A text component with USWDS typography styles.
items.author: @blencorp

items.name: textarea
items.title: Textarea
items.description: A multi-line text input field.
items.author: @blencorp

items.name: textinput
items.title: Text Input
items.description: A single-line text input field.
items.author: @blencorp

items.name: toggle
items.title: Toggle
items.description: A two-state button that can be either on or off.
items.author: @blencorp
